nars.entity

Class TaskLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.entity.Item
      • nars.entity.TermLink
        • nars.entity.TaskLink

  • public class TaskLink
extends TermLink
    Reference to a Task.

    The reason to separate a Task and a TaskLink is that the same Task can be linked from multiple Concepts, with different BudgetValue.
